name: PIONEER COMMERCIAL FUNDING CORP. and Bank One, Texas, N.A., v. AMERICAN FINANCIAL MORTGAGE CORP. and Thomas F. Flatley and Northwest Funding, Inc. and Corestates Bank, N.A. Appeal of Corestates Bank, N.A.
name_abbreviation: Pioneer Commercial Funding Corp. v. American Financial Mortgage Corp.

judges: Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this ease.
parties: PIONEER COMMERCIAL FUNDING CORP. and Bank One, Texas, N.A., v. AMERICAN FINANCIAL MORTGAGE CORP. and Thomas F. Flatley and Northwest Funding, Inc. and Corestates Bank, N.A. Appeal of Corestates Bank, N.A.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of December, 2004, the application for reargument and associated requests for extensions of time to file amicus briefs are DENIED.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this ease.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
864 A.2d 1198
PIONEER COMMERCIAL FUNDING CORP. and Bank One, Texas, N.A., v. AMERICAN FINANCIAL MORTGAGE CORP. and Thomas F. Flatley and Northwest Funding, Inc. and Corestates Bank, N.A. Appeal of Corestates Bank, N.A.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 20, 2004.
